name: Git branch compare tool
description: Get git changed log base on the other branch excluded Cherry-Pick and Merged log list .
notes:
v1.1.16
1、support show range changed log for some one.
v1.1.12
1、fix same author and datetime with old some day in existed list bug.
v1.1.11
1、support markdown output change line log
2、support compare with remote url commit id
3、support SonarLint or CodeReview commit add to Ignore List
4、support same message(the number after message) add to Ignore List
5、support fetch commit task type and task id
v1.1.8
1、improve and fix
v1.1.7
1、support checkout new branch from url
v1.1.6
1、load all branch to compare(include remote branch)
v1.1.5
1、add ignore log support
2、add git progressing loading
v1.1.4
1、 support auto get branch list
2、 change to VCS menu from Tools menu
3、 compare result show in dialog
4、 show execute command list on the result dialog
